Follow me:
I'm applying for CARAS Lab at Tokyo Tech via IGP-C commencing in September 2021.

I'm interested in computer architecture, cloud computing (include virtualization and networking) and operating systems.

I got a bachelor's degree in network engineering from the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) in 2017. Then I joined NetEase as a DevOps engineer. In there, I was in charge of the load balance cluster of NetEase Games private cloud, dealing with Nginx and Linux networking.

Experiences

    2017-2020: DevOps Engineer, NetEase Game.
    2013-2017: BE in Network Engineering, UESTC.

Interest Areas
